name: Wi2ard
description:
INTRO 

Our magic forest is under attack by pot-bellied knights! Join together with your shadow clone and take down the invaders. But be careful, your connection with your clone can be broken, leaving you defenseless.

CONTROLS 

WASD/ARROW KEYS to move around 

Press SPACE while moving to dash 

Press R to control your shadow. Pass through enemies to create a chain. Press R again to travel across the chain and kill enemies 

Watch the hourglass. You can only control your shadow for a limited time! If your human form is hit while controlling your shadow - your connection will be broken - go to your shadow to reclaim it
